media:group.media:title: LIVE. ิฑีฆีฃีกีตีซีถ ีชีธีฒีธีพีซ ีถีซีฝีฟีจ, ีฝีฅีบีฟีฅีดีขีฅึีซ 9
media:group.media:description:
#CivilNet #ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉ
- Subscribe to our channel: https://goo.gl/UnKG5U - Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/civilnet.am/ - Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/CivilNetTV - Follow us on Telegram: https://t.me/s/civilnetv - Find us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CivilNet.TV - Check our website: https://www.civilnet.am/
ยฉ ีีตีธึีฉีซ ีฐีฅีฒีซีถีกีฏีกีตีซีถ ีซึีกีพีธึีถึีถีฅึีจ ีบีกีฟีฏีกีถีธึีด ีฅีถ ีีซีพีซีฌีซีฉีกีฝ ีฐีซีดีถีกีคึีกีดีซีถ: ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีซ ีญีดีขีกีฃึีกีฏีกีถ ึีกีฒีกึีกีฏีกีถีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฐีกีดีกีฑีกีตีถ` ีกึีฃีฅีฌีพีธึีด ีง ึ ีฃีฟีกีฃีธึีฎีฅีฌ ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีซ ีถีตีธึีฉีฅึีจ ีกีผีกีถึ ีบีกีฟีทีกีณ ีฐีฒีดีกีถ, ีถีฅึีขีฅีผีถีฅีฌ ึ ีกีตีฌ ึ ีถีฌีกีตีถ ีฐีกึีฉีกีฏีซึ ีพีฅึีขีฅีผีถีฅีฌ ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีซ ีบีกีฟึีกีฝีฟีกีฎ ึ ีฟีกึีขีฅึีกีถีทีกีถีจ ีฏึีธีฒ ีฟีฅีฝีกีถีตีธึีฉีฅึีจ` ีกีผีกีถึ ีฐีกีดีกีบีกีฟีกีฝีญีกีถ ีฐีกีดีกีฑีกีตีถีธึีฉีตีกีถ:

media:group.media:title: ิฑึึีกีญีซ ีพีฅึีปีซีถ ีจีถีฟึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ. 2023-ีซ ึ ีฃีธีฝีฟีธีฝ-ีฝีฅีบีฟีฅีดีขีฅึีซ ีคึีกีดีกีถ
media:group.media:description:
2023-ีซ ีฝีฅีบีฟีฅีดีขีฅึีซ 19-20-ีซ ีกีคึีขีฅีปีกีถีกีฏีกีถ ีฐีกึีฑีกีฏีธึีดีซึ ีธึ ีฏีกีบีซีฟีธึีฌีตีกึีซีกีตีซึ ีกีผีกีป ิฑึึีกีญีธึีด ีถีฅึึีกีฒีกึีกีฏีกีถ ีดีซ ีทีกึึ ีซึีกีคีกึีฑีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึ ีฅีฒีกีถี ึ ีฃีธีฝีฟีธีฝีซ 28-ีซ ึีธึีตึีถ ีธึ ีพีฅึีชีกีดีตีก ีชีธีฒีธีพีจ, ีถีกีญีกีฃีกีฐ ิฑึีกีตีซีฏ ีีกึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีตีกีถีซ ีฐึีกีชีกึีกีฏีกีถีจ ึ ีฝีฅีบีฟีฅีดีขีฅึีซ 9-ีซ ีจีถีฟึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีจึ ิฑีตีค ีกีดีฅีถีจ ีฟีฅีฒีซ ีธึีถีฅึีกีพ ีทึีปีกึีกีฏีดีกีถ, ีฐีธึีดีกีถีซีฟีกึ ีณีฃีถีกีชีกีดีซ ีบีกีตีดีกีถีถีฅึีธึีดึ ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีจ ีดีฅีฏ ีฟีกึีซ ีกีถึ ึีธึีฑีฅีฌ ีง ีฐีกีฝีฏีกีถีกีฌ ีกีตีค ึ ึีฅึีซ ีคึีกีดีกีฟีซีฏ ีซึีกีคีกึีฑีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีจึ

entry.title: Armeniaโs national electric utility deflects blame for power outages: THIS WEEK IN BUSINESS

media:group.media:title: Armeniaโs national electric utility deflects blame for power outages: THIS WEEK IN BUSINESS
media:group.media:description:
๐ The owner of Armeniaโs largest textile company was detained this week alongside a number of government officials as part of a corruption probe, Radio Azatutyun reported. ๐ The chair of Armeniaโs national electric utility repeatedly deflected blame for increasingly frequent power outages across Yerevan, as public anger continues to mount.

entry.title: Aliyev: Armenia and Azerbaijan agree on most of normalization points

media:group.media:title: Aliyev: Armenia and Azerbaijan agree on most of normalization points
media:group.media:description:
๐ Armenia and Azerbaijan have already agreed to the overwhelming majority of the text of a draft normalization deal, according to Azerbaijani President Ilham Aliyev. ๐ Iranโs top diplomat said his country would not accept any threat to its neighborsโ territorial integrity, in remarks widely seen as hitting back at Azerbaijanโs demand for a corridor through Armeniaโs southernmost Syunik region. ๐ Entrepreneur and Philanthropist Noubar Afeyan launched a new initiative aimed at building Armeniaโs resiliency and prosperity. ๐ Cultivating a collective growth mindset in Armenia with Chris Dedeyan: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bx4fCUj16R0

entry.title: โReflections on a Life in the Russian and Imperial Historyโ by Dominic Lieven

media:group.media:title: โReflections on a Life in the Russian and Imperial Historyโ by Dominic Lieven
media:group.media:description:
Historian Dominic Lieven delivers a lecture titled โReflections on a Life in the Russian and Imperial Historyโ at a symposium organized by the Monterey Initiative in Russian Studies at the Middlebury Institute of International Studies at Monterey. The lecture took place on July 5 in Yerevan.
Dominic Lieven is a distinguished British historian and professor specializing in Russian and international history. He is currently a senior research fellow at Trinity College, Cambridge, as well as a fellow of the British Academy. His research focuses on the Russian Empire, the Napoleonic Wars, and World War I. He has authored several notable books, including โRussia Against Napoleonโ and "Towards the Flame: Empire, War and the End of Tsarist Russia."
This yearโs Monterey Summer Symposium on Russia took place in Yerevan, Tbilisi, and Istanbul from July 1 to July 20.
#CivilNet #ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉ

media:group.media:title: ีีกีทีซีถีตีกีถีจ ีฑีฅีผึีฅึีจ ีฌีพีกึ ิฒีกึีพีธึีด ีบีกีฐีพีธีฒ ีฃีฅึีซีถีฅึีซึ
media:group.media:description:
ิปึ ีฐีฅีฒีซีถีกีฏีกีตีซีถ ีฐีฅึีฉีกีฏีกีถย ีฐีกีฒีธึีคีดีกีถีถ ิทึีซีฏ ีีกีฏีธีขีตีกีถีจ ีดีฅีฏีถีกีขีกีถีธึีด ีง ีพีกึีนีกีบีฅีฟ ีีซีฏีธีฌ ีีกีทีซีถีตีกีถีซี ึ ีฃีธีฝีฟีธีฝีซ 31-ีซ ีกีฝีธึีฌีซีฝีซีถ ีฐีถีนีฅึึีกีฎ ีธึีธีท ีฐีกีตีฟีกึีกึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีซ, ีกีตีค ีฉีพีธึีดี ีกึึีกีญึีซีถีฅึีซ ีพีฅึีกีคีกึีฑีซ ีซึีกีพีธึีถึีซีถ ึ ิฒีกึีพีธึีด ีบีกีฐีพีธีฒ ีฐีกีต ีฃีฅึีซีถีฅึีซ ีณีกีฏีกีฟีกีฃึีซีถึ

media:group.media:description:
ะะบะพะปะพ 50 ะพัะณะฐะฝะธะทะฐัะธะน ะณัะฐะถะดะฐะฝัะบะพะณะพ ะพะฑัะตััะฒะฐ ะััะฐั ะฐ ะฟัะธะทะฒะฐะปะธ ะณะปะฐะฒั ะะะกะ ะฏะฝะฐ ะะพัะณะฐ ัะตัะธัั ะฒะพะฟัะพั ััะฐัััะฐ ะะฐะณะพัะฝะพะณะพ ะะฐัะฐะฑะฐั ะฐ. ะะฒัะพัั ะทะฐัะฒะปะตะฝะธั ะฝะฐะฟะพะผะฝะธะปะธ, ััะพ ะฒ ัะตะทัะปััะฐัะต ัะธัะพะบะพะผะฐัััะฐะฑะฝะพะน ะฒะพะตะฝะฝะพะน ะฐะณัะตััะธะธ ะะทะตัะฑะฐะนะดะถะฐะฝะฐ ะฟัะพัะธะฒ ะััะฐั ะฐ 150 ััััั ะฐัะผัะฝ ะฟะพะด ัะณัะพะทะพะน ัะธะทะธัะตัะบะพะณะพ ะธัััะตะฑะปะตะฝะธั ะฑัะปะธ ะฒัะฝัะถะดะตะฝั ะฟะพะบะธะฝััั ัะฒะพั ะธััะพัะธัะตัะบัั ัะพะดะธะฝั, ะธ ะฒ ะฝะฐััะพััะตะต ะฒัะตะผั ะฒัั ัะตััะธัะพัะธั ะะฐะณะพัะฝะพะณะพ ะะฐัะฐะฑะฐั ะฐ ะพะบะบัะฟะธัะพะฒะฐะฝะฐ. ะฆะตะปั ะธ ัะพะดะตัะถะฐะฝะธะต ะทะฐัะฒะปะตะฝะธั ะกัะตะปะปะฐ ะะตะณัะฐะฑะตะบัะฝ ะพะฑััะถะดะฐะตั ั ััะบะพะฒะพะดะธัะตะปะตะผ ะพะฑัะตััะฒะตะฝะฝะพะน ะพัะณะฐะฝะธะทะฐัะธะธ ยซะะพะทะฒัะฐัะตะฝะธะต ะฒ ะะธะทะฐะบยป ะะฐัะณะฐัะธัะพะน ะะฐัะฐะผัะฝ.
#CivilNet #ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉ #ะธัะพะณะธะฝะตะดะตะปะธ
- Subscribe to our channel: https://goo.gl/UnKG5U - Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/civilnet.am/ - Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/CivilNetTV - Follow us on Telegram: https://t.me/s/civilnetv - Find us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CivilNet.TV - Check our website: https://www.civilnet.am/
ยฉ ีีตีธึีฉีซ ีฐีฅีฒีซีถีกีฏีกีตีซีถ ีซึีกีพีธึีถึีถีฅึีจ ีบีกีฟีฏีกีถีธึีด ีฅีถ ีีซีพีซีฌีซีฉีกีฝ ีฐีซีดีถีกีคึีกีดีซีถ: ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีซ ีญีดีขีกีฃึีกีฏีกีถ ึีกีฒีกึีกีฏีกีถีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฐีกีดีกีฑีกีตีถ` ีกึีฃีฅีฌีพีธึีด ีง ึ ีฃีฟีกีฃีธึีฎีฅีฌ ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีซ ีถีตีธึีฉีฅึีจ ีกีผีกีถึ ีบีกีฟีทีกีณ ีฐีฒีดีกีถ, ีถีฅึีขีฅีผีถีฅีฌ ึ ีกีตีฌ ึ ีถีฌีกีตีถ ีฐีกึีฉีกีฏีซึ ีพีฅึีขีฅีผีถีฅีฌ ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีซ ีบีกีฟึีกีฝีฟีกีฎ ึ ีฟีกึีขีฅึีกีถีทีกีถีจ ีฏึีธีฒ ีฟีฅีฝีกีถีตีธึีฉีฅึีจ` ีกีผีกีถึ ีฐีกีดีกีบีกีฟีกีฝีญีกีถ ีฐีกีดีกีฑีกีตีถีธึีฉีตีกีถ:

entry.title: ิปีถีนีบีฅีฝ ีขีกึีฑึีกึีถีฅีฌ ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีซ ีทีฅีถึีฅึีซ ีฝีฅีตีฝีดีซีฏ ีบีกีทีฟีบีกีถีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีดีกีฏีกึีคีกีฏีจโค ีฆึีธึีตึ ีีฅีฟึีธีฝ ีีฅีทีซีทีตีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟ

media:group.media:title: ิปีถีนีบีฅีฝ ีขีกึีฑึีกึีถีฅีฌ ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีซ ีทีฅีถึีฅึีซ ีฝีฅีตีฝีดีซีฏ ีบีกีทีฟีบีกีถีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีดีกีฏีกึีคีกีฏีจโค ีฆึีธึีตึ ีีฅีฟึีธีฝ ีีฅีทีซีทีตีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟ
media:group.media:description:
ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีซ ีทีฅีถึีฅึีซ ีฝีฅีตีฝีดีกีฏีกีตีธึีถีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีฏีกึีฅีฌีซ ีง ีขีกึีฑึีกึีถีฅีฌ ีดีกีฟีนีฅีฌีซ ีดีซีปีธึีถีฅึีธีพโค ีฏีกึีฎีธึีด ีง ิฑีฝีซีกีฏีกีถ ีฆีกึีฃีกึีดีกีถ ีขีกีถีฏีซ ีฏีธีฒีดีซึ ีธึีบีฅีฝ ีคีบึีธึีถีฅึีซ ีฝีฅีตีฝีดีซีฏ ีฏีกีตีธึีถีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีดีซีปีกีฆีฃีกีตีซีถ ีดีกีฝีถีกีฃีฅีฟ ีถีฅึีฃึีกีพีพีกีฎ ีีฅีฟึีธีฝ ีีฅีทีซีทีตีกีถีจึ ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีซ ิณึีธึีฃ ินีธีฝีธึีถีตีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ีฆึีธึีตึีธึีด ีถีก ีกีถีคึีกีคีกึีฑีฅีฌ ีง ีกีผีฏีก ีญีถีคีซึีถีฅึีซีถี ีทีฅีทีฟีฅีฌีธีพ, ีธึ ยซีีกีต ีดีทีกีฏีธึีฉีกีตีซีถ ึ ีฃีซีฟีกีฏีกีถ ีจีถีฏีฅึีกีฏึีธึีฉีตีกีถยป (ASOF) ีฏีกีฆีดีธึีด ีฑึีกีพีธึีพีกีฎ ีญีธึีดีขีจ, ีธึีฟีฅีฒ ีถีฅึีฃึีกีพีพีกีฎ ีฅีถ ีซีถีชีฅีถีฅึีถีฅึ, ีพีฅึีกีฐีฝีฏีซีนีถีฅึ ึ ีกีตีฌ ีดีกีฝีถีกีฃีฅีฟีถีฅึ, ีบีกีฟึีกีฝีฟ ีง ีกีปีกีฏึีฅีฌ ีบีฅีฟีธึีฉีตีกีถีจี ีญีถีคีซึีถีฅึีซ ีฌีธึีฎีดีกีถ ีธึีฒีฒีธึีฉีตีกีดีขึ

entry.title: Armenia denies opening fire across border as fears grow of new Azerbaijani escalation

media:group.media:title: Armenia denies opening fire across border as fears grow of new Azerbaijani escalation
media:group.media:description:
๐ Russiaโs ambassador to Armenia reiterated Moscowโs willingness to mediate talks with Azerbaijan. In addition, Ambassador Sergey Kopyrkin said he expects Armenia to resume full participation in the Collective Security Treaty Organization military alliance. ๐ Yerevan continued to reject accusations by Baku claiming that Armenian forces opened fire last night and this morning at Azerbaijani positions across the border. ๐ Insights with Eric Hacopian: https://youtu.be/uk6FOj3_9XY
Credits: Ruptly

media:group.media:title: Examining Pashinyanโs press conference
media:group.media:description:
In this episode of Insights, host Eric Hacopian dives deep into the Prime Minister's recent press conference, dissecting key statements and their far-reaching implications. Eric provides his analysis on multiple foreign policy topics, ranging from the right of return of Karabakh refugees, as well as the fate of the prisoners in Baku, offering viewers a comprehensive understanding of Armenia's current geopolitical stance and future trajectory.
